data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Dubatolov, Vladimir V., Volynkin, Anton V. (2017): On the systematic position of the genera Paraplastis Hampson, Migoplastis Felder and Dondera Moore (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Arctiinae). Zootaxa 4358 (2), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4358.2.2|38 occurrences
